translations: 幸福；幸事；造福之物（felicity 的复数）

sentences.sentence: The knowledge of future evils mortified the present felicities.
sentences.translation: 对未来苦难的了解压抑了目前的喜悦。

sentences.sentence: So is all said at once. Virtue is the link of all perfections, the center of all the felicities.
sentences.translation: 此句话比什么都重要。美德是集众善之链，是一切幸福的中心。
